ch.bfh.btx8081.w2015.red.Schlurp.infopage

Class Infopage

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.btx8081.w2015.red.Schlurp.infopage.Infopage

  • public class Infopage
extends java.lang.Object
    An Infopage object represents an information page (abstraction) of a patient with its following data (name, first name and phone number). The data is first generated from the input of the patient in textfields and will be written to a text file. In future the content of the infopage will be retrieved from the text file and displayed in the text fields. If the patient makes changes and saves them, the text file will be overwritten with the new content.

    Note: The input data are not validated.

    Version:
    V30.11.2015
    Author:
    Rea, Kaspar
